itSynergy has been providing IT Consulting to businesses in Phoenix and throughout the United States since 1997.
Our approach is different than most in that we remain constantly focused on the fact that technology is merely a means of supporting and enhancing the objectives of the business.
Our focus is small businesses with a single server all the way up to large mid-market companies with complex multi-server/multi-site technology environments and an in-house IT department and staff.
